title: Wings of Earth: Season One: Complete 5 Book Set
description: The farther from home we get… the darker our universe becomes.Ethan Walker is a freighter captain just trying to pay his bills and stay out of trouble. He commands a ship running cargo in the deep systems of the Coalition, but something he doesn’t understand, keeps spinning what should be routine cargo missions into dangerous trouble.Captain Walker doesn’t want to be a hero, but it seems the universe has other plans.Pirates, slavers, terrorists, and genetically enhanced humans all conspire against him as he struggles to do the right thing and keep his ship and crew alive.Life in the unforgiving black means even a single slip could be the end of them all.If you’re the type to enjoy Star Trek or Firefly, then you should read Wings of Season One. Believable characters, fast paced stories, and enough trouble to keep you turning pages all night.
author: Eric Michael Craig
